resources.string: Canteen app NTAG424
This application is a sample app showing how to use a NTAG424DNA tag for a canteen application.\n\nAdditionally the app shows how to work with encrypted data that needs decryption.

There are 5 icons to click on:
1 home = this page
2 read NDEF message
3 personalize = run all necessary steps to activate UID mirroring without user interaction
4 activate the mirroring of data
5 write the NDEF template to the tag

Note: This app is working with tag types NTAG213, NTAG215 or NTAG216 only !
This app reads an NDEF message
This example expects a NTAG424DNA tag.\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all records will be read.
NFC read result
Used material and their licenses
NDEF message settings
Writes the NDEF message template to the NTAG with defined placeholders for UID, read counter and MAC.\n\nThis is working on tag types NTAG213, 215 or 216 only.
There are 2 steps to do:\n1. press the TEST AND SAVE NDEF SETTINGS button\n2. tap a NTAG21x tag to the reader
Activate the mirroring of data to NDEF message
Activates the mirroring of data (UID, read counter and MAC) in an NDEF message on tapping
choose your action
Run all steps to personalize a tag for NDEF mirroring

This are the steps that will run when a tag is tapped

1. write the NDEF template to the tag
2. disable all existing mirror
3. enable UID mirroring
4. write the UID-based MAC to the tag
5. Bocking the tag from write access with a password
The app will IMMEDIATELY write to an attached tag without any further confirmation !
Backup and Restore settings

Write the settings to a binary file or restores the settings from a binary file (located in external storage like Downloads folder).\nRestoring will overwrite existing settings without further confirmation.
Chose your action
Bulk registration of tags
Register tags for backend server using an export file
rg inf
